originalText.text: Dr. Amirian is excellent. He provided me a clear, succinct description of my conditions and needed follow up. He provided equally clear answers to my questions which, to me, is critical for the doctor-patient relationship. Finally, Dr. Amirian 's calm, approachable demeanor greatly reduces the anxiety of doc visits.

originalText.text: Best cardiologist in New York. Very friendly, knowledgeable, professional and compassionate. Also I have never seen a nicer doctor’s office in my life. The office is huge and immaculately clean. The office is equipped with every machine imaginable and everything is in like-new condition. I highly recommend this doctor

text.text: Best cardiologist in New York. Very friendly, knowledgeable, professional and compassionate. Also I have never seen a nicer doctor’s office in my life. The office is huge and immaculately clean. The office is equipped with every machine imaginable and everything is in like-new condition. I highly recommend this doctor

originalText.text: I went to see Dr. Amirian for some health maintence and check up and was pleased to have a professional and thorough exam.  The Dr and his staff took the time to explain and make recommendations that were very helpful.  I would very much recommend his services.  Thank you.

text.text: I went to see Dr. Amirian for some health maintence and check up and was pleased to have a professional and thorough exam.  The Dr and his staff took the time to explain and make recommendations that were very helpful.  I would very much recommend his services.  Thank you.

originalText.text: Wonderfully run practice and very thorough, caring doctor. He takes the time to listen and explain—rare these days!  Low key, professional office environment and the staff is friendly and competent. I feel very secure under his care.

text.text: Wonderfully run practice and very thorough, caring doctor. He takes the time to listen and explain—rare these days!  Low key, professional office environment and the staff is friendly and competent. I feel very secure under his care.

originalText.text: I was extremely fortunate to have met Dr. Jossef Amirian in October 2022 when I was experiencing symptoms related to my heart. While under his professional care Dr. Amirian oversaw that i underwent a multitude of tests until he was able to diagnose. Ultimately I had two stents placed in my heart. I’m feeling better than ever. I immediately felt comfortable with Dr. Amirian. His bedside manner is excellent. He is very thorough, professional and shows a genuine concern. I never had a moment of uncertainty under his care and I highly recommend Dr. Amirian.
